segments.text: Have you received your TOWEL test results yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations ! I knew you could do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I certainly couldn't have done it without your help . You are the best tutor I've ever had .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , but it was your hard work that did it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You deserve credit , too . I've learned so much from You .
segments.speaker: S2
